TextManager.isEnglish
To select or confirm something:
On keyboard: Press the confirm key (Default key: Z)
On gamepad: Press the confirm key (Default xbox key: A; Dualshock key: X)
On mouse: Left click on the item
To move around:
On keyboard: Use the arrow keys
On gamepad: Use the directional buttons/joystick
On mouse: Left click on a location on the map
TextManager.isJapanese
To select or confirm something:
On keyboard: Press the confirm key (Default key: Z)
On gamepad: Press the confirm key (Default xbox key: A; Dualshock key: X)
On mouse: Left click on the item
To move around:
On keyboard: Use the arrow keys
On gamepad: Use the directional buttons/joystick
On mouse: Left click on a location on the map
TextManager.isEnglish
This game uses an autosaving system.
Please do not close the game until the autosaving message
on the bottom left of the screen is gone.
TextManager.isJapanese
This game uses an autosaving system.
Please do not close the game until the autosaving message
on the bottom left of the screen is gone.
TextManager.isEnglish
Secretary Mode is recommended for players who just want to
have an easy, casual, stress-free experience.
TextManager.isJapanese
Secretary Mode is recommended for players who just want to
have an easy, casual, stress-free experience.
TextManager.isEnglish
Warden Mode is the intended experience for most players.
This is the recommended mode for first timers who are
experienced RPG players.
TextManager.isJapanese
Warden Mode is the intended experience for most players.
This is the recommended mode for first timers who are
experienced RPG players.
TextManager.isEnglish
Prisoner Mode is the mode for hardcore players who love
a good test of their understanding of this game's systems.
This mode is not recommended to first timers.
TextManager.isJapanese

TextManager.isEnglish
The difficulty can only be changed after a game over,
and can only be changed to an easier mode.
